attributes.action: Stop the use of school uniform in all UK schools
attributes.additional_details: Students in America have this right so why shouldn't UK children?
attributes.background: School uniforms are uncomfortable, sweaty, and don't alow students to express them self's. Children should have the right to dress how they want in school and not be dressed up like barbie dolls. Children would focus better if they weren't over heating in the thick uniforms they are made to wear
